name: Wallace Associates
tag_list: landscape-architects, landscape-architect, landscape-consulting, landscape-consultants, landscape-design, licensed-contractors, distinctive-garden-design, garden-design, landscapers, landscaping-services, landscaping, outdoor-rooms, outdoor-room-design
overview:
Wallace Associates consists of registered landscape architects,award winning designers, builders and horticulturalists. They offer complete project management for creative garden design, outdoor rooms, ponds, pools, and native landscapes.

With their award winning designs and professional staff, the company offers top-notch services such as project management for landscaping and remodeling jobs. They specialize in landscape design and are familiar with various types of gardens (distinctive, English, formal, American, Roof, Rain, Herb, Perennial, Estate, Knot, and European) as well as various landscapes.

At Wallace Associates, the staff is also familiar with designing outdoor rooms with features such as outdoor kitchens, lighting, and BBQ’s. They are equipped to design the environment of someone’s dreams with waterfalls, pools, iron, arbors, trellises, stonework, walkways, and terraces.

relationships.title: Landscape Architect, Project Estimator & Contracts Manager
